Package gr.uoa.di.NmapProject.SA

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GetPendingJobs
    Creates and Manages jobFinderThread
    Globals
    Set of Global variables
    JobFinder
    Job Finder
    JobQueue
    Shared queue for one time jobs
    Main
    Main class of SA After registering successfully Creates and starts all threads
    MySystemFiles
    Class for file managment
    NmapJob
    Nmap job Class
    OneTimeJobs
    Handler for one time job thread pool
    OneTimeJobThread
    Thread for one time jobs
    PeriodicJobs
    Handler for periodic job Threads
    PeriodicJobThread
    Thread for executing a periodic job
    Registration
    Information required for registering to AM
    Result
    Class for results of a job
    ResultQueue
    Shared Queue For storing results
    SAProperties
    Responsible for the configuration of the SA
    SenderThread
    Thread for sending results over to AM
    SendResults
    Handles Sender Thread
    ServerRequest
    Class for making requests to AM
    Stopper
    Stopper class for exiting normally
